Detailed Description

Defines a player character.

A player character must have a valid input device associated before being added to a Plane.

See also:
Input Plane

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Player::Player ( const char *  file )

Default constructor.

Load player from definition file. This file should also have the Sprite definitons.

Parameters:
filePlayer definition file.
See also:
Sprite

Member Function Documentation

void Player::Draw (  ) [virtual]

Blit the Player into the owner Plane.

Every Player must be assigned to a Plane before being drawed.

Assign input device to player.
